rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Small foyer with a built-in shoe rack and coat hangers.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Modern open-plan living area with a contemporary design featuring exposed beams and natural light. The layout allows interaction with the garden through large windows.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space within the living room, designed for family meals. Compliant with Vastu principles by having the seating arrangement facing east.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient modular kitchen with modern appliances, sufficient storage and prep area, designed to maximize functionality while adhering to local building norms.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Compact space for washing machine, dryer, and pantry; includes proper ventilation as per local norms.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Cozy nook dedicated to reading and study, with built-in shelves and comfortable seating, placed near a window to ensure ample natural light.

openings.description: Large entry door that opens onto the garden area, enhancing the connection with nature.
Floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and provide a view of the garden.
Small outdoor balcony near the living room for additional relaxation space.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite with an en-suite bathroom, closet, and walk-in area; designed to face north as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom for children/other family members, featuring adequate storage and a small study corner if desired.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom with modern fixtures and proper ventilation; located adjacent to the master bedroom.

openings.description: Split-level access to first floor, ensuring smooth transition between levels.
Windows placed according to Vastu principles to invite positive energy.

rooms.name: Attic/Storage
rooms.description: Utilitarian space for storage or future expansion; designed with budget constraints in mind.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: Additional study room to support children's learning, doubling as a guest area if needed.

openings.description: Well-integrated staircase leading to the second floor.
